scripts.transpile: babel src -d bin --ignore "**/*.test.js" && babel models -d bin/models
scripts.setup: yarn run transpile && claudia create --api-module bin/api --region ap-southeast-1 --version development --set-env-from-json env.json --timeout 4 && claudia set-version --version production
scripts.deploy: yarn run transpile && claudia update --version development && claudia set-version --version production
scripts.deploy-dev: yarn run transpile && claudia update --version development --timeout 4
